alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Dubuque (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 07 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Illinois and northeast Iowa, including the following counties, in northwest Illinois, Jo Daviess and Stephenson. In northeast Iowa, Buchanan, Delaware and Dubuque. * WHEN...Through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Rainfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hours may result in flash flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Locally heavy rainfall through this morning and again tonight may result in flash flooding.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
